item.description: [[Cloak of the Bat]] Wondrous item, rare (requires attunement) While wearing this cloak, you have advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks. In an area of [[dim light]] or [[darkness]], you can grip the edges of the cloak with both hands and use it to fly at a speed of 40 feet.
